name: TickerMode
desc: Enables or disables tickers (and thus animation controllers) in the widget subtree.

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: The requested ticker mode for this subtree.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

nodes.name: Unified Enable/Disable Animation
desc: The enabled property of TickerMode can uniformly enable/disable the animation effects of the subtree.
